Search and Find an IGO

Source: R/igo_search.R
igo_search.Rd

Search any IGO by name or string pattern.

igo_search(pattern = NULL, exact = FALSE)

Arguments

pattern

regex pattern. If NULL the function returns a dataset with all the IGOs on igo_year_format3. Integer values are accepted.
exact

Logical. When TRUE only exact matches are returned.

Value

A dataframe.

Details

The information of each IGO is retrieved based on the last year available on igo_year_format3.

An additional column label is provided. This column is a clean version of longorgname

See also

igo_year_format3

Examples

# All values
all <- igo_search()

nrow(all)

#> [1] 534
colnames(all)

#>  [1] "ionum"                            "ioname"                          
#>  [3] "orgname"                          "longorgname"                     
#>  [5] "label"                            "sdate"                           
#>  [7] "deaddate"                         "dead"                            
#>  [9] "integrated"                       "replaced"                        
#> [11] "igocode"                          "version"                         
#> [13] "accuracyofpre1965membershipdates" "sourcesandnotes"                 
#> [15] "imputed"                          "political"                       
#> [17] "social"                           "economic"                        

# Search by pattern
igo_search("EU")[,1:3]

#>   ionum      ioname                                              orgname
#> 1    10       ACPEU                                ACP/EU Joint Assembly
#> 2  1830          EU                                       European Union
#> 3  1600       EUFMD             Euro Comm for Control Foot-Mouth Disease
#> 4  1563     EURAMET European Association of National Metrology Institute
#> 5  1565     EURATOM                        European Atomic Energy Agency
#> 6  1730 EUROCONTROL                            Euro Org Safety Air Navig
#> 7  1630    EUROFIMA          Euro Comp for Finance Railway Rolling Stock
#> 8  1590     EUROMET      European Collaboration on Measurement Standards
#> 9  4510         WEU                               Western European Union

igo_search("EU", exact = TRUE)[, 1:3]

#>   ionum ioname        orgname
#> 1  1830     EU European Union

# With integers
igo_search(10)[, 1:3]

igo_search(10, exact = TRUE)[, 1:3]

#>   ionum ioname               orgname
#> 1    10  ACPEU ACP/EU Joint Assembly

# Several patterns (regex style)
igo_search("NAFTA|UN|EU")[,1:3]

#>    ionum      ioname                                              orgname
#> 1     10       ACPEU                                ACP/EU Joint Assembly
#> 2    430     AGPUNDO                     Arab Gulf Prog. for UN Dev. Org.
#> 3   1830          EU                                       European Union
#> 4   1600       EUFMD             Euro Comm for Control Foot-Mouth Disease
#> 5   1563     EURAMET European Association of National Metrology Institute
#> 6   1565     EURATOM                        European Atomic Energy Agency
#> 7   1730 EUROCONTROL                            Euro Org Safety Air Navig
#> 8   1630    EUROFIMA          Euro Comp for Finance Railway Rolling Stock
#> 9   1590     EUROMET      European Collaboration on Measurement Standards
#> 10  3670       NAFTA                                   North American FTA
#> 11  4400          UN                                       United Nations
#> 12  4410      UNESCO             UN Education, Scientific, & Cultural Org
#> 13  4420       UNIDO                        UN Industrial Development Org
#> 14  2790    UNIDROIT           Intl Instit for Unification of Private Law
#> 15  4510         WEU                               Western European Union

# Several patterns Exact (regex style)
igo_search("^NAFTA$|^UN$|^EU$")[,1:3]

#>   ionum ioname            orgname
#> 1  1830     EU     European Union
#> 2  3670  NAFTA North American FTA
#> 3  4400     UN     United Nations
